title: Simulation-Based Learning Course for Logistics Management

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental logistics management concepts, basic computer application skills
context.additional_context: For working professionals, solving logistics problems encountered in the workplace via simulation games, combining online (game platform) and offline (workshop) activities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain resource allocation optimization strategies in logistics network design.
Learners can analyze and decide on lead-time-cost trade-offs in inventory management simulations.
Learners can implement an alternative evaluation process for supply chain risk scenarios in a game-based environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
